title: The Aftermath of a YouTube Apology
description: Quantifying the lasting impact of a YouTube controversy.

content.value: When a YouTuber apology video became a Halloween costume, it was time to break out the investigation kit.

Why YouTubers? All sorts of celebrities have controversies and ultimately issue a publicly apology. But few have to ðŸ’© where they eat, so to speak, making it uniquely interesting. Also thereâ€™s data. Letâ€™s dive in.
We researched nearly every possible popular YouTuber that had some sort of controversy and the found ones with  apology videos.
We found 31 notable in the past few years, then classified their pre and post apology subscriber trajectories to compare their short and long term effects.
There is no one-size-fits-all video approach or reaction. Beauty YouTubers reign supreme.

So what was the impact on their bottom line? The best we can do is look at their audience, YouTube subscribers. Step one: look at their pre-controversy growth trajectory to get a sense of where they were headed.
Most people are growing. Some are stable, a couple are losing subscribers.
Step two: Fast forward to their post-apology subscriber change to see what happened. We skipped the period in between because it ranged from one day to a year since each controversy was different
Wide variety of results here. To make better sense of the trends, we can try to group them to find similar patterns.
Applying the k-means clustering algorithm, we get a few distinct groups.
